Class AudioSettings

java.lang.Object
com.comp2042.audio.audioSettings.AudioSettings
public final class AudioSettings extends Object
Backwards-compatible static facade for application audio settings.

This final utility class delegates all operations to an instance of AudioSettingsService (by default DefaultAudioSettings). The static API is preserved for existing callers while allowing tests or advanced callers to replace the underlying implementation via setImplementation(AudioSettingsService).

    • setImplementation

      public static void setImplementation(AudioSettingsService service)
      Replace the internal AudioSettingsService implementation. This method is intended for tests or advanced usage where a different persistence/behaviour is required.
      Parameters:
      service - non-null service to delegate audio settings operations to
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if service is null

    • restoreDefaultImplementation

      public static void restoreDefaultImplementation()
      Restore the default implementation that persists settings via Preferences.
